publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1061 Mr Mark Ruskell: Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to make publicly available legal advice in respect of its powers in relation to the placing of Chardon LL genetically modified maize on the UK seed list and the interpretation of the precautionary principle in relation to GM crops.

S2M-1061 Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize (lodged on 17 March 2004) Alex Fergusson*, Mark Ballard*, Eleanor Scott*, Bruce Crawford*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Patrick Harvie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Frances Curran*

S2M-1061 Mr Mark Ruskell: Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to make publicly available legal advice in respect of its powers in relation to the placing of Chardon LL genetically modified maize on the UK seed list and the interpretation of the precautionary principle in relation to GM crops. Supported by: Alex Fergusson, Mark Ballard, Eleanor Scott, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Patrick Harvie, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Frances Curran, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-1061 Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize (lodged on 17 March 2004) Shiona Baird*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1061 Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize (lodged on 17 March 2004) Christine Grahame*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1061 Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize (lodged on 17 March 2004) Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1061 Legal Advice on Chardon LL Maize (lodged on 17 March 2004) Chris Ballance*
